participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is outgoing and adventurous. She loves exploring new activities and is particularly enthusiastic about outdoor sports.
participant_1.background: i am also a graduate student. i walk dogs for a living. my parents taught me survival skills. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and a bit of a homebody. He enjoys routine activities like gym workouts and tends to prefer the company of his pets over large social gatherings.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. two dogs live with me. eating is something i do when i am bored.

content.text: hello, how are you? I am a student. what do you do?
I'm a student too. And I'm a fan of sport. Do yiu like sport?
I do not like sport, but I like to walk dogs. do you?
Yes, I have two beautiful dogs - Carrie and Karl!
do you have any pets? I have a cat, and a survival
do you like to read? I do. I like reading journals
I do too. I like to
What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to walk my dogs. what about you?
I like to walk with my dogs too! Also I like going to the gym
that sounds like a lot of free time. do you walk?
what are you going to do with your dogs?
